query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Buio d’inferno e di notte privata 2 d’ogne pianeto, sotto pover cielo, 3 quant’ esser può di nuvol tenebrata,

query.result: 1 Kegelapan neraka dan malam yang kehilangan 2 semua planet, di bawah langit yang malang, 3 seberapa pun yang dapat digelapkan oleh awan yang gelap,

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

7 che l’occhio stare aperto non sofferse; 8 onde la scorta mia saputa e fida 9 mi s’accostò e l’omero m’offerse.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 m’andava io per l’aere amaro e sozzo, 14 ascoltando il mio duca che diceva 15 pur: «Guarda che da me tu non sia mozzo».
query.error: **English:** 13 so I went through the bitter and foul air, 14 listening to my guide who kept saying: 15 “Be careful not to get separated from me”.
query.result: 13 begitulah aku berjalan melalui udara yang pahit dan busuk, 14 mendengarkan pemanduku yang terus berkata: 15 “Hati-hati jangan sampai kau terpisah dariku”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Io sentia voci, e ciascuna pareva 17 pregar per pace e per misericordia 18 l’Agnel di Dio che le peccata leva.
query.error: **English:** 16 I heard voices, and each one seemed 17 to pray for peace and for mercy 18 to the Lamb of God who takes away sins.
query.result: 16 Aku mendengar suara-suara, dan masing-masing tampaknya 17 berdoa untuk kedamaian dan belas kasihan 18 kepada Anak Domba Tuhan yang menghapus dosa.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Pur ‘Agnus Dei’ eran le loro essordia; 20 una parola in tutte era e un modo, 21 sì che parea tra esse ogne concordia.
query.error: **English:** 19 Though ‘Lamb of God’ was their exordium; 20 one word in all of them and one manner, 21 so that there seemed among them every concord.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 «Quei sono spirti, maestro, ch’i’ odo?», 23 diss’ io. Ed elli a me: «Tu vero apprendi, 24 e d’iracundia van solvendo il nodo».
query.error: **English:** 22 "Those are spirits, master, that I hear?" 23 I said. And he to me: "You truly perceive, 24 and from anger they are untying the knot."
query.result: 22 "Mereka itu roh, guru, yang kudengar?" 23 kataku. Dan dia kepadaku: "Engkau benar-benar mengerti, 24 dan dari kemarahan mereka melepaskan ikatan."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 «Or tu chi se’ che ’l nostro fummo fendi, 26 e di noi parli pur come se tue 27 partissi ancor lo tempo per calendi?».
query.error: **English:** 25 "Now who are you who cleaves our smoke, 26 and speak of us as if you 27 still measured time by calendars?"
query.result: 25 "Sekarang siapakah kamu yang membelah asap kami, 26 dan berbicara tentang kami seolah-olah kamu 27 masih mengukur waktu dengan kalender?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Così per una voce detto fue; 29 onde ’l maestro mio disse: «Rispondi, 30 e domanda se quinci si va sùe».
query.error: **English:** 28 Thus it was said to me by a voice; 29 whereupon my master said: "Answer him, 30 and ask if one goes up from here."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 E io: «O creatura che ti mondi 32 per tornar bella a colui che ti fece, 33 maraviglia udirai, se mi secondi».
query.error: **English:** 31 And I: "O creature who cleanses yourself 32 to return beautiful to the one who made you, 33 you will hear a marvel, if you follow me."
query.result: 31 Dan aku: "Wahai makhluk yang membersihkan dirimu 32 untuk kembali cantik kepada yang menciptakanmu, 33 kamu akan mendengar keajaiban, jika kamu mengikutiku."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 «Io ti seguiterò quanto mi lece», 35 rispuose; «e se veder fummo non lascia, 36 l’udir ci terrà giunti in quella vece».
query.error: **English:** 34 "I will follow you as far as I am able," 35 he replied; "and if seeing smoke does not allow it, 36 hearing will keep us joined in that case."
query.result: 34 "Aku akan mengikutimu sejauh yang kumampu," 35 jawabnya; "dan jika melihat asap tidak memungkinkan, 36 mendengar akan membuat kita tetap bersama dalam hal itu."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 37 Then I began: "With that sash 38 which death dissolves, I wish to go up, 39 and I came here through the infernal anguish.
query.result: 37 Kemudian aku mulai: "Dengan selempang itu 38 yang kematian hancurkan, aku ingin naik ke atas, 39 dan aku datang ke sini melalui penderitaan neraka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
